page.title: 19LANGUAGE IN ABERNYTE
page.content: Scottish words used in our area. Drouth - Dry Snell - Cold Droocket- Wet Gawk - Fool Tattie - Potato Creetin- Weeping Gutters - Mud Muckle - Big Peck - Pant Girn - Badtemper Forkietail-Earwig Clegg - Horsefly Stappit Fu - Full Up Jock Shaws Brae - The road from East Newton Dairy to Newton Bank The Witches Dub -The small pond above North Pitkindie Cottage. The Glebe the field between the church and Kirkton Craig. The Fairy Footsteps-Steps on the top of the hill above Abernyte Rhymes said when throwing balls 1,2,3 alairie KP,clappy,rollie 4,5,6 alairie backie,underleggy 7,8,9 alairie Through the moon 10 alairie Dab Dab Dab Postman
